emuInput.TitMainTitle: Ammon Pony League baseball team, first row from left: co-captain Ronald Jackson, Michael Simms, Kenneth Blackwell, Alan Taylor; second row: co-captain Robert Ryan, Ronald Broadway, Ralph Greene, John Jackson, Robert Marshall, George Weston, manager Edward Dean; third row: coach David Boggus and Rennard Braxton posed on field
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 1, 1962, pg. 20, reads: "Pony Leaguers - Members of the Ammon Pony League team turned in an outstanding diamond performance this season. Left to right, front row: Ronald Jackson, co-captain; Michael Simms, Kenneth Blackwell and Alan Taylor. Second row: Robert Ryan, co-captain; Ronald Broadway, Ralph Greene, John Jackson, Robert Marshall, George Weston and Manager Edward Dean. Third row: Coach David Boggus and Rennard Braxton. - Harris Photo."
